values: why i sit like .. every guy is the same ? all dogs .. all liars .. and all of them are the ones that i like . cant be someone that is like ugly and i have like nooooo attraction for .. could it ? nooo course not . so yeah .. now im stuck between a rock and ahrd place . i know hes not going to be happy with me, and i see that his feelings for this ' other girl ' are goin to et in the way . so do i back down now .. or pursue the matter only to end up embarassed and hurt again ? i mean .. i feel horrible for this other girl . ya kno ? i mean .. shit . i didnt even kno . n then once i start askin the right people .. thats just it . everything comes out im the open . annd thats when feelings got hurt . im not answering my phone for nobody no more . ive fucked up too much shit in the past week . i dont care bout nothin or no one nemore . im tired of always bein someones ' get away ' . i wish that for once .. i could be their reality .

tonights gonna be interesting . i gotta qwork at 8 on sat so ima be mad tired tomorrow . casey's havin a party . so .. that'll be fun . buuuhhh im kinda scared . not of the party .. buh of liking casey . i cant like him . i mean i do .. but its bad cuz like .. every relationship just comes out bad in the end . and omfg . casey's an aries too . ahhhh omg . this is baadddd .

Harsh words & violent blows
Hidden secrets nobody knows
Eyes are open, hands are fisted
Deep inside I'm warped and twisted

So many tricks and so many lies
Too many when's and too many why's
Nobody's special, nobody's gifted
I'm just me, warped and twisted

Sleeping awake and choking on a dream
Listening loudly to a silent scream
Call my mind, the number's unlisted
Lost in someone so warped and twisted

On my knee's, alive but dead
Look at the invisible blood I've bled
I'm not gone, my mind has drifted
Don't expect much, I'm warped and twisted

Burnt out, wasted, empty, and hollow
Today's just yesterday's tomorrow
The sun died out, and the ashes shifted
I'm still here, warped and twisted

lmao .. casey's a trip yo . all cuzza allie i met him .. and like .. i dontregret it at all . we chill all the time and like .. lmao hes just such a fun person .. only problem is .. me n him are like .. sooooo much alike .. that im kinda scared to be around him too much .

like ive had too many situations go wrong . ive lost too many friends due to technicalities .. and .. it seems kinda weird to me that im scared of .. him <33
